channel.title: Opinions on The Median Duck
channel.description: Recent content in Opinions on The Median Duck

item.title: The Elephant in the Room
item.description: The Elephant The Room: Series 19 Opinion (so far) The Elephant Hello. It’s been a while and I apologise to my single digit audience for my absence. I would love to say that I had a good excuse for my absence, but the truth is rather more boring than that. However, it’s time embrace the free time the I have regained and reignite this (passion) project. The simple truth is that the Board volunteer position I held for the Housing Association associated with my condominium (a flat for UK readers) took over a significant proportion of my time and energy.
